ComicInfo.Title: Dip Shit the Teenage Jack-Off; Curse of the Mysterious Horror!; Space Sluts!; Egghead; Big Fun!; Leftovers!; Trash - what do we throw away?; Gold is Where You Find It; Joe Franklin is a Dream Walkin'; Old Bud Abbott; Cool Alley; Fireball Freddie!; The Bunch, Her Baby & Grammaw Blabette

ComicInfo.Summary:
Dip Shit is caught masturbating.
The telling of a joke goes wrong
A visit to a spooky house
Baron Klaw deals with the Space Sluts
Egghead is the victim of violence
Assorted designs
Assorted strip ideas cobbled together
Crumb considers trash
Butch trucker Axel is hired to deliver a sensitive shipment.
Joe Franklin walks through Times Square in his sleep
Bud Abbott is called by a reporter
Champ collects some bootleg hooch
A romeo is taken for a ride.
Cool Breeze stands Marsha up
Cool Breeze and Marsha have a row
Cool Breeze is caught two-timing.
Baby Sophie's reactions to her grandmother
